edu.cuny.ai.learning
Class QLearner

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.ai.learning.AbstractLearner
      edu.cuny.ai.learning.QLearner
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscreteLearner, Learner, MDPLearner, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class QLearner
extends AbstractLearner
implements MDPLearner, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, Parameterizable, Prototypeable

An implementation of the Q-learning algorithm, with epsilon-greedy exploration.

Parameters

base.k
int >= 0		 (the number of a possible actions)
base.s
int >= 0		 (the number of states)
base.e
double [0,1]		 (the epsilon parameter)
base.p
double [0,1]		 (the learning rate)
base.g
double [0,1]		 (the discount rate)

Default Base

qlearner

Version:
$Revision: 1.17 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
Serialized Form

Description copied from interface: DiscreteLearner

getLearningDelta

public double getLearningDelta()
Description copied from interface: Learner
Return a value indicative of the amount of learning that occured during the last iteration. Values close to 0.0 indicate that the learner has converged to an equilibrium status.

Specified by:
getLearningDelta in interface Learner
Specified by:

A double representing the amount of learning that occured.
